about_the_game:
Fling to the Finish - Supporter Pack


The supporter pack contains a selection of goodies for Fling to the Finish, for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developer of the game.

Contents

  • An exclusive monkey character to play as
  • An exclusive secondary skin for the monkey, with cymbals!
  • Exclusive party skins for 8 of the regular characters
  • Cover art wallpaper and two additional whacky wallpapers

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
